item.title: Yahoo launched three applications for Android yesterday. Cancelled them today.
item.description:
#“Yahoo launched three applications for Android yesterday. Cancelled them today.”

via phandroid.com

Yes an exaggeration but unless Carol Bartz gives an ironclad guarantee that she will quit if any app or site that they launch is not fully backed by Yahoo for at least the next three years, I’m never touching another Yahoo app.

It’s looking like her legacy will be the CEO who wouldn’t pay Best Buy $100 for a 1TB hard disk to store all of Geocities.
